text: "Foolish" is a song recorded by American singer Ashanti. It was released on January 29, 2002, by Murder Inc. Records and Def Jam. The song samples "Stay with Me" by the R&B; group DeBarge. Ashanti co-wrote the song with Irv Gotti and 7 Aurelius, who produced the song. It reached #1 on the Billboard Hot 100 and was ranked the #2 song of 2002 in the US by Billboard. == References == Category:2002 songs Category:Hip hop soul songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs
title: Foolish (Ashanti song)
